title: Riot please help the Public chats.
body: Everytime i go on looking for group, it is just spammers/advertisers yet no talking, please ban spammers to leave a friendly chat for us :-)

replies.body: Do you think they actually care about a feature they implemented in the original client?

The public chat rooms are not monitored. There's nothing there to prevent a person from spamming or advertising. It's become this sort of null zone where productivity is taboo and no real discussion can be held. If you need to have a real chat with people using the League client, you can always make your own room and invite a few friends.
